rejection.details:
Please do not use BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.

Feedback should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
